ComicInfo.Title: The Dog of War Part 3
ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Dog of War
ComicInfo.Summary: The Dog of War Part 3: Having grown attached to Latinum, the Deep Space Nine crew prepares to say farewell, as Quark's mystery buyer suddenly appears on the station and steals both the dog and the Borg device.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 03:44:48. [CVDB993712] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:47:30. [Issue ID 2543628]
ComicInfo.Characters: Quark's mystery contact,Gul Dukat (image),Ensign Nog,Lt. Commander Jadzia Dax,Captain Swapna Krishna (image),Admiral William Ross,Latinum (a dog),unnamed Cardassian,Captain Benjamin Sisko,Chief Miles O'Brien,Jake Sisko,Morn,Dr. Julian Bashir,Constable Odo,Elim Garak,Lt. Commander Worf,Alaytia (Betazoid),Vic Fontaine (hologram),Major Kira Nerys,Quark
ComicInfo.Teams: U. S. S. Defiant Crew,Deep Space Nine Crew,Starfleet
